title: Michael Hudson - How we use Twisted in Launchpad
description:
How we use Twisted in Launchpad

Presented by Michael Hudson-Doyle

Abstract

Launchpad is a large, open source, "real world" Python project with many
moving parts. This talk will explain how Twisted helps us keep track of
them.

Outline

Although we don't use it for the core web application, most other places
in Launchpad that have to deal with concurrency issues do it using
Twisted. This talk will survey these areas and talk about issues we've
found and design patterns we've found helpful.
